name: hurl outward at a certain pace
body:
hurl outward at a certain pace is a site-specific work created in [ONCA Gallery](http://onca.org.uk/pastexhibitions/september-place-ecology-and-the-digital/) & online in September 2016. It was commissioned by Brighton Digital Festival & DRHA 2016. 

3 – 11 September at ONCA Gallery
3 – 30 September online at hurloutward.com


[jane frances dunlop](janefrancesdunlop.com).......[artist statement & list of works](http://files.cargocollective.com/611128/HURL-OUTWARD-AT-A-CERTAIN-PACE.pdf).......exhibition essay
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
